definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
housewife/woman of senior authority in a household/the lady of the house/hostess

sentences.english: The second chapter focuses on business women. that is a new group.
sentences.chinese: 第二章的焦点是商人妇，这是一个新兴的群体。

sentences.english: Pregnant ladies are advised to consult the doctor prior to the examination.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕妇女检查前必须向医生谘询意見。

sentences.english: Today, I got a call from the hospital that my fiance was in the ER.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我接到一个电话说我的已婚妇被收进了抢救室。

sentences.english: She affirmed that the British laundress was not a mistress of her art.
sentences.chinese: 她还断言，英国的洗衣妇没有掌握这一行的本领。

sentences.english: I have several aunts who OUGHT to be washerwomen.
sentences.chinese: 我也有好几位姑母，本来都要做洗衣妇的。

sentences.english: Gynaecology is a branch of medicine.
sentences.chinese: 妇科学是医学的一个分科。

sentences.english: The gynaecologist here will not acknowledge this either.
sentences.chinese: 这里妇科学家不承认这点。

sentences.english: But the washerwoman felt his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 但是洗衣妇注意到了他的眼光。

sentences.english: As a lifelong child widow she had no reason to worry about being separated from her children.
sentences.chinese: 身为望门寡妇，她没有理由担心同孩子们分开。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the method for determinating the content of caffeotannic acid in Fukangning Soft Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立妇康宁软胶囊中绿原酸含量的测定方法。

sentences.english: As I said, I have an aunt who is a washerwoman;
sentences.chinese: 我刚才说，我有位姑母，她是个洗衣妇。

definition: concubine/I, your servant (deprecatory self-reference for women)
son-in-law living at wife's parent's house
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
(of a woman) to marry/to marry off a daughter/to shift (blame etc)
chaff, husks, distillers' dregs etc (food eaten by the poor)/(fig.) rubbish/junk/(abbr. for 糟糠妻[zao1 kang1 qi1]) wife who goes through the hardships of poverty with her husband
